paragraph: Chris Peterson (born May 14, 1968) is a Canadian producer and electronic musician from Vancouver, British Columbia. Throughout his career he has worked with numerous bands in the Canadian industrial and electronic music scene of which Front Line Assembly and Delerium are the most notable. He is married to Kerry Peterson of Stiff Valentine.
